quote: No one asks how to motivate a baby. A baby naturally explores everything it can get at, unless restraining forces have already been at work. And this tendency doesn't die out, it's wiped out.
quote_letters: NO ONE ASKS HOW TO MOTIVATE A BABY A BABY NATURALLY EXPLORES EVERYTHING IT CAN GET AT UNLESS RESTRAINING FORCES HAVE ALREADY BEEN AT WORK AND THIS TENDENCY DOESNT DIE OUT ITS WIPED OUT
